An Chanwon

Korean: 안찬원

Hometown:

Icheon, Gyeonggi-do

An Chan Won

Birthday:

Age:
17 years old
Group (2023-present):
The Wind

Introduction

An Chanwon is a South Korean singer under With US Entertainment, a subsidiary of Around US Entertainment. He made his official debut as a member of the boy group The Wind on May 15, 2023.

As of January 23rd, 2024, An Chanwon was absent from The Wind's upcoming 2nd Mini Album, "Our: YouthTeen", due to his health.

He returned back to activities as of Children's Day 2024 and participated in their next comeback "Sirius Pt.2".
